CustomField.formula: IF( Village__r.Total_GIA__c > 0, Size_GIA__c / Village__r.Total_GIA__c, Size_GEA__c / Village__r.Total_GEA__c )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Proportion of the Village GIA taken up by this units GIA, if no GIA values are available then GEA will be used
CustomField.label: Proportion
